cause.description:
TWLOHA Has been going through some changes, one of which is the fact that the organization is no longer a part of Fireproof Ministries. As such this facebook cause's donations do not reach the actual cause.
As I, Jonathan White, am pursuing other interests, I no longer work for TWLOHA, so if you have questions or comments, please email:
info@twloha.com
Thanks.
1. Love is the movement.
2. Rescue is possible.
3. We can be rescued, and we are called to be rescuers.
cause.mission: THIS IS NO LONGER THE OFFICIAL TWLOHA CAUSE
cause.name: TWLOHA has changed.
